name: spumoni
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sweet, cold Italian dish made of layers of ice cream with different flavours, and often fruit or nuts : Spumoni often contains chocolate, cherries, and pistachios or other nuts. The desserts include petits fours, lemon ice, and spumoni.
More examplesFewer examplesThe biscotti that came with the spumoni was the best I've ever had.The spumoni was unrecognizable compared to the stuff you buy in the freezer section of your supermarket.When it was time for dessert we couldn't decide between the spumoni and the tiramisù.
